roleset.name: be short of, not possess
roleset.note: LACK-V NOTES: Frames file for 'lack' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry, Framenet entry Possession. Comparison with own. (from lack.01-v predicate notes)
LACK-N NOTES: Based on lack.01. No corresponding VN entry. (from lack.01-n)

example.name: transitive, agentive
example.text: While competitors moved production offshore in response to the sagging competitiveness of Japanese factories, Sansui lacked the money to build new plants in Southeast Asia.
example.arg: While competitors moved production offshore in response to the sagging competitiveness of Japanese factories
the money to build new plants in Southeast Asia

example.name: ergative, almost adjectival
example.text: Evidence on John's criminal insanity is lacking.

example.name: All arguments, within LVC
example.text: Citing a Judaic law-book of the 16th century which identified a woman for the days preceding , during , and following her period as niddah ` impure , ' Miles has the lack of taste to write the following : .
example.arg: Citing a Judaic law-book of the 16th century which identified a woman for the days preceding , during , and following her period as niddah ` impure , '

example.name: Funny headline, all arguments
example.text: Dog expresses his lack of will to take a bath.
example.arg: of will to take a bath.
